meta.title: Long Screenshot Splicer - Fragment Selection
meta.description: Upload a long screenshot, freely select the fragments you need, and export them as a ZIP archive or PDF document.
header.title: Long Screenshot Splicer
header.subtitle: Upload a long screenshot, freely select the fragments you need, and export as ZIP or PDF.
upload.title: Upload Long Screenshot
upload.hint: Supports JPG, PNG formats | Max size 10MB
preview.title: Select Slices to Export
export.title: Export Selected Content
footer.copyright: ¬© 2023 Long Screenshot Splicer | All processing is done in your browser to protect your privacy.
footer.nextFeatures: Next Stage: Adding OCR Text Recognition and Smart Typesetting features.
js.alert.invalidSliceHeight: Please enter a valid split height (100-5000 pixels)
js.alert.noSlicesSelected: Please select at least one slice
feedback.title: Submit Feedback or Feature Request
feedback.description: Scan the QR code or click the button below to submit your valuable feedback.
